<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1927</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thomas Alva Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thomas Alva Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Thomas Alva Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Thomas Alva Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Thomas Alva Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Τχομας Alva Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Thomas Alva Edison</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for English students, where the students read and learn about the inventor Thomas Edison and his Inventions. They answer questions about the topic, and write about Edisons personality</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inventions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inventors</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer, in denen die Kursteilnehmer über den Erfinder Thomas 
Edison und seine Erfindungen lesen und erlernen. Sie beantworten
Fragen über das Thema und schreiben über Edisons 
Funktionseigenschaft</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais, où les étudiants ont connaissance et apprennent 
de l'inventeur Thomas Edison et de ses inventions. Ils 
répondent à des questions au sujet du sujet, et écrivent au sujet 
de la personnalité d'Edisons</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses, onde os estudantes lêem e aprendem sobre o 
inventor Thomas Edison e suas invenções. Respondem a perguntas
sobre o tópico, e escrevem-nas sobre a personalidade de Edisons</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli allievi
inglesi, in cui gli allievi leggono ed imparano sull'inventore Thomas 
Edison e sulle sue invenzioni. Rispondono alle domande circa il 
soggetto e scrivono circa personalità di Edisons</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές, όπου οι σπουδαστές διαβάζουν και 
μαθαίνουν για τον εφευρέτη Thomas Edison και τις εφευρέσεις 
του. Απαντούν στις ερωτήσεις για το θέμα, και γράφουν για 
την προσωπικότητα Edisons</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses, donde los estudiantes leen y aprenden sobre el 
inventor Thomas Edison y sus invenciones. Contestan a preguntas 
sobre el asunto, y escriben sobre la personalidad de Edisons</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfindungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">invenções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inventores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
